name: AeroCareers Flying Club
about: AeroCareers Flying Club is a premier flight training facility, offering FAA Part 141 certified programs for private pilot and instrument certifications. Our highly trained, FAA-certified instructors provide personalized flight instruction tailored to each member's needs. We operate a fleet of well-maintained aircraft, including Cessna 172 and Cessna 182 models, and utilize advanced training devices like the Redbird MCX flight simulator. Membership is open to active and retired military personnel, dependents, DoD civilians, and Civil Air Patrol members. We prioritize safety, adhering to both FAA and Air Force regulations, and host regular safety meetings. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced pilot, AeroCareers Flying Club offers a supportive, family-oriented environment to achieve your aviation goals. Join us to turn your passion for flying into a reality.
